thread.title: Excellent Hotel, great service !!!!
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel, great service !!!! - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Carlocanocho
title: Excellent Hotel, great service !!!!
text:
Located at the center of Rome , close to all museums and historic places just walking , very safe place and great service, if you are traveling to Rome this is the place to be, Hotel staff is very helpful , my Youngest son got sick and they did everything to help us, breakfast its free and diverse, clean service was excellent , we stayed for 10 days , and i highly recommend it.
Room Tip: Breakfast finish at 10 , See more room tips
